title: Station Masters’ Union to take part in hartal
body_lines: The Sri Lanka Railway Station Masters' Union (SLRSMU) said that they have decided to participate in the nationwide hartal tomorrow.
They said the decision was taken by the central committee meeting held yesterday.
Accordingly, the Union will refrain from all services from midnight today in view of their  participation in the hartal. (Chaturanga Samarawickrama)
